StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetApprovedWaiverHistoryForNwa]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaID int)
AS
SELECT cw.NWA_ID AS NwaID, cw.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID AS CandidateWaiverID, cw.WAIVER_ID AS WaiverID, cw.WAIVER_SUBMISSION_DATE AS DateSubmited, wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC AS Category, wt.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC AS Type, wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC AS Level, ws.WAIVER_STATUS_DESC AS Status, wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE AS CategoryCode, wt.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE AS TypeCode, wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE AS LevelCode FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_WAIVER] cw WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_STATUS] ws ON ws.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE = cw.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_OCCASION] wo ON wo.WAIVER_OCCASION_ID = cw.OCCASION_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER] w ON w.WAIVER_ID = cw.WAIVER_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_CATEGORY] wc ON wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = w.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_TYPE] wt ON wt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = w.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_LEVEL] wl ON wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = w.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID WHERE cw.NWA_ID = @NwaID AND cw.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE = 'A'
